title: PartUsed Entity Schema
description: JSON schema for PartUsed entity in the event-based processing system

id.description: Unique identifier for the part used record

serviceId.description: Identifier of the service this part was used in

partName.description: Name or description of the part

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the part used record was created

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the part used record was last updated
